import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// User Slice
const userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:{status:false,user:{}},reducers:{// Login
login:state=>{state.status=true;state.user={name:'Jhon Doe',role:'customer',email:'jhondoe@gmail.com',pass:'jhondoe123'};},// Register
register:(state,action)=>{let{user,email,pass}=action.payload;state.status=true;state.user={name:user,role:'customer',email:email,pass:pass};},// Logout
logout:state=>{state.status=false;state.user={};}}});const userReducer=userSlice.reducer;export const{login,register,logout}=userSlice.actions;export default userReducer;
